entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
